pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, March 2, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Metro Vancouver, British Columbia

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the “Gathering Wisdom for a Shared Journey” conference. He will be joined by the Minister of Indigenous Services and Minister responsible for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Northern Ontario, Patty Hajdu.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Vancouver, Ken Sim, and visit a local coffee shop.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
